string.text: Hidden Threat: The Beginning
The commander wants me to find the 'black cat' in the 'dark room'.\n I should ask Colonel Kuznetsov for more detail.
Hidden Threat: Surviving Stalker

There was no further substantial information from Kuznetsov concerning my assignment.
 Also, the colonel instructed me to check what happened to the stalkers in the Darkscape.
 At the farm in Cordon, there is a stalker who survived the attack on the Sawmill.
 I will have to use a disguise to talk to him.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
Something went wrong and the stalker is dead. I need to inform Kuznetsov of the failure.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Sawmill in the Darkscape
It's worth looking around the Sawmill for any useful information that might shed some light on what happened here in the recent past.
Hidden Threat: Examine the Sawmill Building
It's worth looking around the Sawmill for any useful information that might shed some light on what happened here in the recent past.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
Not much found, to say the least. It's time to go back to the commander with a report.
Hidden Threat: Disable Brain Scorcher

The "Brain Scorcher" is seriously hampering military operations in the north. Kuznetsov has given a difficult assignment: to deal with it. The scientists on Yantar must have already figured out a way to do this. We need to talk to Sakharov.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
The "Brain Scorcher is disabled. I must report this to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Jupiter Plant
An "SOS" signal was received from the squad that Degtyarev had sent on a secret mission. It was reported that they were attacked at the Jupiter factory and urgently need fire support.
Hidden Threat: Inspect Jupiter Plant Production Facilities
The entrance to the plant is empty. I need to go further into the production facilities.
Hidden Threat: Examine Bodies of the Attackers

The soldiers are dead and could not be saved. What mission they performed at the plant, only Degtyarev knows.\n Unknown stalkers gave me a warm welcome. They were looking for something at the plant. Hmm... Chevrons with symbols unknown to me. Perhaps the colonel knows more.\n I should collect at least one.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Kuznetsov
The unknown stalkers had patches with symbols I have never seen before. Perhaps the colonel knows more about them.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
Lieutenant Kirillov asked me to stop by and see him. I should find out what he needs from me.
Hidden Threat: Take the radio military in the Dark Valley
All it takes is a little work as the letter carrier Pechkin. I think I can handle it. A detachment of military units guard the entrance to "X-18" in the Dark Valley and are waiting for my package.
Hidden Threat: Repel the ISG Attack
Wrong time, wrong place. I need to organize a defense.
Hidden Threat: Examine the Attackers
I am alive and well. I should examine the attackers for useful information.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
A locked PDA was found on one of the ISG mercenaries, most likely the commander of the group. Our technician shouldn't have a problem though.
Hidden Threat: Wait for Kirillov to Unlock the PDA
Kirillov said that that he won't need more than a day or more to unlock the PDA.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
The technician has reported that the PDA has been unlocked.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Kuznetsov

On the now-unlocked PDA, we found a marked map of the Jupiter Plant over X-18, where I met up with the ISG. Consequently, other markers seem to be targets of the ISG. I need to report this to Kuznetsov.
Hidden Threat: Meet Sergeant Gorobetz
The sergeant spotted the ISG group and has asked for help. The meeting place is the Hospital in the outskirts of Pripyat.
Hidden Threat: The Mouse in the Mousetrap
Hidden Threat: Destroy ISG Sniper
The ISG has been ordered to eliminate Colonel Degtyarev. I don't have time to warn the colonel. I need to find and kill this sniper, quick.
Hidden Threat: Provide Fire Support to the SSU Detachment
The sniper has been eliminated. Now the SSU detachment led by Degtyarev is being attacked by the ISG assault group. I need to rush to their aid.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Degtyarev
The ISG group has been eliminated. I should talk to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Find the Case in the Department Store
The colonel instructed me to retrieve the briefcase left by an SSU agent from the department store.
Hidden Threat: Take the Case to the Agroprom
Degtyarev is waiting for me with the case at the Agroprom military base.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Degtyarev
I received an order from the colonel to return to the base and talk with him.
Hidden Threat: Place the Recorder
I need to place the recorder in a house that stands alone in the south-west of the Dead City.
Hidden Threat: Wait 2 Days
The recorder has been placed. I need to pick it up in two days.
Hidden Threat: Pick up the Bookmark from Dead City
Two days have passed. I need to pick up the recorder and take it to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Return to Degtyarev
I have the recorder. I need to take it to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Talk to the Squad Leader at CNPP
The ISG are planning to infiltrate the CNPP. They're most likely already there. My job is to keep them out of the Sarcophagus. My support squad is waiting for me at the arranged location.
Hidden Threat: Go to the Northwest of CNPP

Only mercenaries were found at the main entrance with no sign of the ISG. The squad leader reported that one of his scouts has gone silent and fears he may have been found and killed. Since the main entrance is not our primary target, it's worth checking the road from the Hospital.
Hidden Threat: Eliminate the ISG Team
It's just as I suspected... the mercenaries were distracting the main monochrome forces, and the group of ISG quietly came in from the side of the Hospital.
Hidden Threat: Report Success to Degtyarev
The group of ISGs were destroyed. I need to report this to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Report to Colonel Kuznetsov
In the absence of Degtyarev, I now once again answer to Kuznetsov.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Major Vereshchagin
Major Vereshchagin is the same SSU agent who saved my life in Pripyat. What could have happened to bring him here? How could this be?
Hidden Threat: Get to the Entrance of the Pripyat Underground
I'm finally done with the ISG. My assault squad is waiting for me at the Jupiter side entrance to the Pripyat Underground.
Hidden Threat: Enter the Pripyat Underground
It's about time we finally finish the off the ISG. It's all coming to a head.
Hidden Threat: Eliminate ISG Presence in the Pripyat Underground
It's time to finish off the ISG.
Hidden Threat: Report Success to Major Vereshchagin
The ISG is finshed. The assault was a success. It's time to report to Major Vereshchagin.
[HT]Southern Checkpoint: Hand Over Documents
Give the accounting reports to Major Zhurov, at the Southern roadblock in Cordon.
[HT]Agroprom: Find Courier

Sergeant Lozhkin instructed me to find the lost courier somewhere on the road to the base from the dump. It has been made clear that he Sergeant is more interested in the package he was carrying than the actual courier.
[HT]Agroprom: Return Package to Lozhkin

Sergeant Lozhkin instructed me to find the lost courier somewhere on the road to the base from the dump. It has been made clear that he Sergeant is more interested in the package he was carrying than the actual courier.
%s, your presence is required at the base. There is an urgent assignment.

Milstalker, our case is still at a dead end, but there's a difficult assignment ahead of you. Our northern operations are severely hampered by the Brain Scorcher. Talk to Sakharov in Yantar and find a way to disable it.
Milstalker, come see me. I need to talk to you.
%s, come in for a minute, we need to talk.
%s, about your PDA. Come on over, we have something to talk about.

Hey %s, long time no see. I spotted a group of ISG. I can't do this alone and I need your help. Do you have the guts to go to the hospital in the outskirts of Pripyat? If so, you'll maybe even earn some new stripes from the bosses.
Milstalker %s, orders are to arrive at the base and report straight to me.
Milstalker %s, orders are to report to me immediately.
Received:
%s: free stalkers - 2 hours
Armistice
%s asked for you. We opened a free pass to our bases for 2 hours. Let's not do anything stupid if you want to live. Our boys... they don't like warriors very much.
The %s truce is over.
Received:
New PDA entry: A note from Sgt. Lozhkin
Military
I see the enemy! To battle!
Place of interest
